# Solar-panel-fail-detection-demo
Python project in which a Flir thermal camera and a raspberry pi are used to detect and classify potential failures in solar panel cells

## Prerequesites

* Flir Camera, in my project I used this one 
* Type C to USB adapter
* Raspberry pi
*

## Install


![alt text](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

## Deployment

* 1 -
* 2 - Use VNC to connect to the raspberry and show what is catching with the Flir camera


**NOTE: Run the program mqtt_sub.py before easy.py or you may lose the first events sended!!**
